entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Runtime.Tests times out and gets killed #90834
  • Equals on EventId from Microsoft.Extensions.Logging check only ID #90831
  • ProfilingAPI: `ICorProfilerInfo14::GetNonGCHeapBounds` deadlock on .NET 8.0-preview7 #90830
    8.0.0
  • Blittability check doesn't account for generic structs #90828
    9.0.0
  • Test failed: System.Diagnostics.Tests.PerformanceCounterCategoryTests.PerformanceCounterCategory_GetCounters #90803
  • [Mono] RuntimeTypeHandle.Equals seems to be broken in Release mode #90800
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!"Bad CastToType() in gtFoldExprConst() for a cast from long" #90798
  • [API Proposal]: Vector2, Vector3, Vector4 deconstruction and reconstruction #90795
  • Remove support for `--used-attrs-only` in illink #90793
    9.0.0
  • Incomplete type errors in lldb/gdb when when using clang-13 or newer #90791
  • System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch When measuring small time periods #90788
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: `IJsonSerializable<TSelf>` #90787
    Future
  • Can't import native functions with 64bit parameters when using mono_add_internal_call #90786
    9.0.0
  • build.cmd is not compatible with pyenv-win #90782
  • [API Proposal]: Implement INumber<T> for vector types and operator interfaces for matrix types. #90781
  • AddMetrics can initialize MetricsSubscriptionManager multiple times #90779

Closed

  • JIT: win-arm64 native varargs doesn't correctly split incoming vectors between register and stack #89595
    8.0.0
  • [8.0] [mono] System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.NodeFor - Operation is not supported on this platform #90806
    8.0.0
  • [7.0] WasmTestOnBrowser END OF WORK ITEM LOG: Command timed out, and was killed #86615
    9.0.0
  • [WASM] Add telemetry to track the use of WasmStripILAfterAOT #90671
    9.0.0
  • `UnrechableBlocksOptimizer` has bad performance #90717
  • Need add optimize Document for IlcScanReflection #90171
    Future
  • Consider shipping `RequiresPreviewFeaturesAttribute` as a downlevel assembly #79479
    Future
  • Trimmed InlineArrayAttribute breaks Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection #90745
    8.0.0
  • Non-English output from `build.cmd` are displayed as gibberish #90069
  • NativeAOT EventPipe library needs to work correctly when EventSource support is enabled #82231
    8.0.0
  • Blazor WebAssembly suffers memory leaks from compiled lambda expressions #82716
    8.0.0
  • [8.0] [wasm] Expected the multithreading runtime pack to be available when running on CI. IsRunningOnCI is true but IsWorkloadWithMultiThreadingForDefaultFramework is false #90805
    8.0.0
  • [8.0] [wasm] Runtime pack path doesn't match #90804
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.IO.Tests.FileSystemWatcherTests_netstandard17.DroppedWatcher_Collectible #86564
    8.0.0
  • How can i enable promotionstructs opt flag ? #90784
  • cmove is not emitted for a simple expression #90017
    9.0.0
  • GC heap initialization failed with error 0x8013200B BEGIN: coreclr_initialize failed - Error: 0x8013200b END: coreclr_initialize failed - Error: 0x8013200b #90715
  • Port System.Security documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88575
    8.0.0
  • Question: xml escape/unescape characters #90477
  • Test failure JIT/superpmi/superpmicollect/superpmicollect.sh #90723
    9.0.0
  • System.ArgumentException: Stream does not support reading. (Parameter 'stream') when reading from HttpMessageResponse.Content.ReadAsStringAsync() #88198
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Test simulated R2R bug #90837
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Check for generic structs in "needs marshalling" check #90836
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Use Roslyn interceptors feature in binder gen #90835
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #90833
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-rc1] [mini] Fix typo in mono_decompose_vtype_opts #90832
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc1] [WASM] Enable telemetry for WasmStripILAfterAOT #90827
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Events for IL methods without IL headers #90826
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mini] Fix typo in mono_decompose_vtype_opts #90825
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add Task.Delay to WinHttpHandler AfterReadResponseServerError_ClientWrite test #90824
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [wasm] Bump chrome version used for testing #90823
    arch-wasm
  • Case: The method has not been jitted yet #90821
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc1' => 'release/8.0' #90819
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Change OneLocBuild mirror branch to release/8.0 #90813
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • [main] Change OneLocBuild mirror branch to release/8.0 temporarily #90812
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Error out when NativeLib has EventPipe enabled #90811
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix queue count in rate limiters #90810
    area-System.Threading
  • [release/8.0] HTTP & SSL Stress: Run nightlies against release/8.0 #90809
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Mono] Update file owner for simd related files #90807
    area-Meta
  • Fix config names for CallCountThreshold and CallCountingDelayMs #90799
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix calling existing ctor with MethodInvoker; share tests with invokers #90796
    area-System.Reflection
  • Make DacValidateMD and DacValidateMethodTable more resilient #90794
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Introduce a switch to use FullOpts for cctors #90792
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Just running tests with new EH enabled on all platforms #90790
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • Issue 90788 improvments to System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch #90789
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix win-arm64 native varargs ABI #90712
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Stop skipping tests in installer pipeline on linux_x64 #89953
    area-Host
  • [release/7.0][manual] Merge release/7.0-staging into release/7.0 #90648
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 7.0.x
  • [WASM] Enable telemetry for WasmStripILAfterAOT #90820
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Improve linker performance by avoiding IndexOf #90721
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc1' => 'release/8.0' #90749
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [main] Call SetupNuGetSources for installer jobs #90756
    needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Disable BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow test #90818
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Add note about IlcScanReflection to the native aot docs #90765
    documentation, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-rc1] [wasm] Do not build mono libs with `-msimd128` #90750
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix imports for bump-chrome-version.proj #90822
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Relink for non-unicode tests should be running. #89419
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Disable readytorun/GenericCycleDetection/Depth3Test #90802
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Disable BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow test #90801
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Implement IStatefulPinnedMarshalling test marshallers #90685
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fix SuperPMI assertion call in `MethodContext::recGetHelperFtn()` #90778
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Make chrome version bumps for testing explicit, instead of automatic updates to latest #90772
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Make DacValidateMD and DacValidateMethodTable more resilient #90797
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • HTTP & SSL Stress: Run nightlies against release/8.0 #90808
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • Redo IL Verification #90418
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [FileSystemWatcher] Linux - Null out 'watcher' variable when continuing to process events to prevent strong reference #90780
    area-System.IO
  • JIT: Add a head merging transformation alongside the tail merging transformation #90468
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Use Roslyn interceptors feature in binder gen #90340
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Expose an internal ISimdVector interface and being using it to deduplicate some SIMD code #90764
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • `PEImage` should not expose ref to `m_path` field #90753
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Bump main version to 9.0-alpha1 #90558
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • [Corrected] - Enable Libraries R2R Testing in CI #89405
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Move event pipe utf8/utf16 string conversion functions to shared event pipe code #90774
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Add New Test to Monitor Number of Jitted Methods #90681
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Try enabling full trimming by default when not using blazor #89110
    area-Build-mono
  • Update 7.0 to use Ubuntu 22.04 queues for Perf runs #90767
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix Position and Seek for MemoryStream with custom origin #88572
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add Native AOT Pri0 test leg #89421
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ability to request stackwalk per EventPipe session #84077
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Notify jiterpreter when a method is freed #89980
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [RISC-V] Fix tmpReg in emitInsTernary #90770
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [DRAFT][mono][aot] Implementation of nollvm init method #89074
    NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Trying to fix MT debugging experience. #90771
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono] Initialize module's image ALC for dynamic objects #90731
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • Update Fedora docker image to Fedora 38 #90776
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono] Enable Yield_r* tests with full-AOT (llvm) #90614
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [LoongArch64] Fix some errors after the kernel supporting SIMD. #90734
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Implement MVP part of const generics for CoreCLR #89636
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Fix MarshalStructAsLayoutSeq #90719
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Make ValueTuple members that can be made readonly readonly #90773
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Implement AppendAllBytes API #90364
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Struggling getting a PoC with a native library and wasmtime to run - out of bounds memory access #2378
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Question: Interest in wit-bindgen for c# #2377

PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Always use `memset` in `buildStoreLocalField` #2373
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add support for `JitDisasm` #2371
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Updating patch version does not cleanly remove old SDKs #34764
  • dotnet.exe should allow installing a single package with both an extension/tool and dotnet new templates #34763

Closed

  • <ServerGarbageCollection>false</ServerGarbageCollection> is not honored in Directory.build.props #22372

PullRequests

Created

  • I noticed a copy issue in another PR which may be related to the reference here that shouldn't be necessary. #34768
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #34748
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #34734
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow

Merged

  • [release/8.0.1xx] Disable failing tests #34766
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [main] Disable failing tests #34765
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Backport of 'First-run workload experience #34322' to release/8.0.1xx #34694
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disable failing tests #34759
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove platform from output path #34651
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add back the current version of MSBuild that got removed by accident in the CPM PR #34687
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #34652
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Ran 'dotnet format' on sdk.sln #34659
    untriaged
  • Allow ArtifactsPath telemetry to flow #34660
    untriaged, Document for new feature, Area-NetSDK
  • Enable interceptors feature when ConfigurationBindingGenerator is enabled #34732
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, .NET 8.0
  • Download tool packages from NuGet feeds directly, instead of implicitly restoring #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Bump version of ICSharpCode.Decompiler to 8.1.0.7455 #69613
  • LSIF generator should implement 'standard error protocol' and report exceptions, health, and performance metrics #69610
  • In .editorConfig UI there's no way to push a setting from Visual Studio settings to the editorConfig file #69604
  • Semantic snippets: possible duplication/wrong modifier order after `partial` keyword #69600
  • Semantic snippets: type snippets should have different valid modifiers #69599
  • Semantic snippets: postfix inline statement snippets are not shown if the next statement starts with a contextual keyword treated as identifier #69598
  • Go to Definition fails over LSP for source generated files #69595

Closed

  • Codelens to get the references on fields is missing #69583
    Backlog
  • VS Code extension does not provide CodeLens for fields #69606
  • Generic constraints should prune out candidates for method group natural type #69222
    17.9
  • Inference of function type should only consider one extension scope at a time #69042
    17.9
  • Possible bug related to `UnscopedRef` introduced in 7.1.200 #67626
    17.8
  • Regression in 7.0.200 when using UnscopedRef on a property #67697
    17.8
  • Interface implementations don't inherit default members #69601

PullRequests

Created

  • Run design time builds out-of-process #69616
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add reproducer for is-pattern temp issue #69615
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move to 8.0 preview 7 ref assemblies in compiler tests #69614
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Cherry-Pick #69497 #69612
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Cherry-Pick #69497 #69611
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Report misplaced unchecked in cref as warning #69609
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update doc for IsRecord #69607
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged
  • Cache substituted base type #69605
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add locals to binder from out vars in array rank specifiers on local functions #69597
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8

Merged

  • Include CodeLens on remaining types and members #69608
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Revert "Avoid creating a result temp for is-expressions" #69582
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Move helpers for 'use collection expression'. #69581
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Improve detection of receiver cloning in ref safety analysis #67736
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next

Updated

  • Support creating binlogs for the language server's design time builds #69572
    Area-IDE
  • Implement support for emitting PrivateImplementationDetails to EnC deltas #69485
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Another way to correct generate Uri for new Document when resolve code action #68995
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce array allocations in `PENamedTypeSymbol.TypeParameters` and `PENamespaceSymbol.GetMembers` #68978
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Backlog
  • Avoid creating result temp for switch-expressions #69194
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: overload resolution #69594
    New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Add EA support so that asp.net can create instances of the 'Add Nuget Package' code fix in a lightbulb. #69586
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update compiler toolset to latest #69544
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add analyzer/fixer to suggest changing code fluent collection building to a collection expression #69580
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Semantic snippets - make `foreach` snippet work with `await` and async enumerables #69538
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Implement ref switch expressions #69575
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Pool lexed token arrays in SyntaxParser. #69499
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add automated Blazor Hybrid test #50193
  • Perf improvement: caching, multiple_queries #50189
  • [Blazor] Finalize behavior of JavaScript initializers for Blazor Web apps #50187
  • Give Blazor SSR access to HTTP Context #50185
  • Quarantine LongPollingUsesHttp2ByDefault #50180
  • gRPC JSON transcoding documentation with Swagger / OpenAPI error #50177
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Grpc.Swagger Package Version #50176
  • Can we use Redis backplane to persist and read negotiate tokens to avoid sticky sessions in load balanced environment? #50171

Closed

  • ASP.NET Core 8-p6 Blazor page does not load in new browser window #49657
  • ASP.NET Core Webhooks #48438
    Discussions
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #50156
  • Perf improvement: json #50117
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #50155
  • Quarantine LongPollingUsesHttp2ByDefault #49966
  • Perf regression: fortunes, single_query #50118

PullRequests

Created

  • Update NavMenu.razor to use project name #50194
    area-mvc
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc1' => 'release/8.0' #50191
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Avoid some Logger instantiations per request #50184
    area-mvc
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `7e33b6a` to `f42da0e` #50182
    area-infrastructure
  • API review followups #50181
    area-blazor
  • [Draft] Watch certificates using polling and checksums #50172
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Add internal queues to skip list for AOT #50190
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-rc2
  • Resolve FormOptionsMetadata to FormOptions when reading form #50166
    feature-http-abstractions, Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-middleware, 8.0-rc1
  • Correct download location of internal runtimes #50186
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-rc2

Updated

  • Support hot reload for Blazor component endpoints #50031
    area-blazor
  • [DRAFT] Consider symlinks when watching certificate file paths #50074
    area-runtime
  • [Blazor] Close the circuit when all Blazor Server components are disposed #50170
    area-blazor
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2247147 #49575
    area-mvc
  • Add feature to expose IIS hosting details #50128
    area-runtime
  • Persist Prerendered State #50146
    area-blazor
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50167
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Support Keyed Services in MVC #50145
    area-mvc
  • Call AddMetrics inside AddRouting #50168
    blocked, area-runtime, area-routing

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to click controls in a CarouselView in iOS #16867
  • A #16866
  • Maui Shell ios crashes on navigation #16862
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] iOS: Shell navigation crashes the app with SIGSEGV #16860
    .NET 8 GA
  • Binding of Entry control seems to break after entering text in Entry #16859
  • SwipeView open/close methods don't work as expected #16858
  • Grid rows not sizing properly on Windows #16857
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] Bug: iOS - CollectionView scroll sometimes stops working if swipeView is inside datatemplate #16856
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] Bug: Android & iOS - Binding inside of DataTemplate not working if swipeView is present #16855
  • [MAUI]Some pictures could not be loaded. #16851
    .NET 8 GA
  • [MAUI]After rotating the emulator from horizontal to vertical orientation, the card of page My Recipes is truncated. #16850
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.1.7762] TwoWay Binding does not work when value is changed from the source ViewModel #16849
    .NET 8 GA
  • [MAUI]The scroll bar cannot be dragged to the far right after resizing the window to be smaller on Windows #16848
    .NET 8 GA
  • .Net Maui projects are under Other > Custom instead of Multi-Platform #16846

Closed

  • Failed to connect to localhost/127.0.0.1:5001 #16863
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.5.8529] Provide API to set ImageSource to the ImageSourcePartLoader #16367
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/7.0.86] A NullReferenceException is thrown on Android in the GridLayoutManager when calling InvalidateLayout #15729
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Problem doing a data binding in GraphicView #16671
  • Visual Studio Compatibility with MAUI Blazor RTL Layout #16694
  • Maui BlazorWebView input covered by Keyboard #14197
    .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Mysterious back button shows up on root page when navigating back from second page #16328
    .NET 8 GA
  • void VisualElement.Arrange(Rect bounds) doesn't arrange. #16823
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix CollectionView not displaying header or footers #16870
  • Use the x86 emulator for API 27 #16869
  • Add interface to expose out UIView methods #16868
  • Fix blurry FontImageSource icons in iOS Tab Bar and buttons #16864
    area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 8 GA
  • Correct minor Barometer API docs mistake #16853
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Improve the control over resource generation #16845
    .NET 8 GA

Merged

  • Add a "VSCode" target to open the "maui.code-workspace". #16732
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7.0] Fix Grid cells not honoring MaxWidth #16837
    area/layout 🔲, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Make it more obvious how to use shell with sandbox #16840
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, area/testing
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16844
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [macOS] Don't force the RID to be x64-only #16678
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Backport net7.0] Add doc comments for common types used in templates #16852
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Document Brush & Colors #16738
    area/docs 📓, backport/suggested, .NET 8 GA

Updated

  • [build] Manage extensions via maestro #16834
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Fix Border RoundRectangle CornerRadius issue #14995
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-border, .NET 8 GA
  • Add note about ClipsToBounds/IsClippedToBounds #16833
    area/docs 📓
  • Fix Flyout Crash (Windows) #16800
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-flyout, i/regression, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Fix issues setting Shell TabBar appearance #15748
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, Under Consideration
  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling - MCT Popup Scrolling Fix #16201
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [windows] Fixed CarouselView items rendering #16842
    area/collectionview 📃, .NET 8 GA
  • [net7.0] Revert default for UseSafeAreaProperty to value from .NET 6 for iOS #16379
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [core] use factory methods for registering services #16741
    area/perf 🏎️, .NET 8 GA
  • Enable Windows device tests on net7.0 #16756
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [BuildTasks] Fix resolution for nested types #16841
    area/Xaml </>, .NET 8 GA
  • Default paths for Appium projects, to simplify run steps #16763
    area/testing
  • Rename Accelerator to KeyboardAccelerator #16740
    area/keyboard, .NET 8 GA

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Executing Migrator by having an ambient transaction #31507
  • Primitive collection type mapping infra doesn't support reverse-engineering #31505
  • Group By followed by Where and Count could not be translated #31504

Closed

  • JSON type representations and conversions to store types #30727
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc1' => 'release/8.0' #31502
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
